It's the time to show your teeth to those impudent heroes now!

Build your squads of minions to get revenge on those greedy human heroes who disturb our peaceful life! Take back the legendary weapons that they looted from our dungeons! And equip your minions with them to create an ultimate dark force.

-- Features --
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ We distills lot of the greatest and classic elements of roleplaying and strategy games into this fantastic game!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily command your army via simple touch commands.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create your own battle squad from 50+ different minion classes, including ghosts, zombies, skeleton warriors, even dark sorcerers from the eastern world could join your team!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Upgrade, level up your minions by get more experience points in battles. More battle you win, more powerful your squad is.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make the most of your minions's skills to control the battlefield - healing, critical attack, lightning blot and more!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 100 unique quests with great story line to be challenged with epic boss battles!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Online ladder challenge real people around worlds, loot treasures from other players!
